Scottsboro City Schools Code of Conduct

span.style: text-align: center; font-family: Tahoma; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: Click Each icon for more information

span.style: text-align: center; font-family: Tahoma; font-size: 16px; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

p.span: At this time, the SCS has submitted its Local Education Agency Academic Continuity Plan for the reminder of the 2019-20 school year. This plan is in accordance with the guidelines as set forth by the ALSDE. We are very appreciative of the great work that Dr. Mackey and his staff have done at the ALSDE during this most difficult of times. The administration and teachers of each school will be reaching out to students in the very near future to begin this process. I appreciate the patience of our parents and students as well as the dedication of our school administrators and teachers during this unprecedented time.

p.style: margin: 0px 0px 6px; font-family: Helvetica, Arial, sans-serif; color: rgb(28, 30, 33); font-size: 14px;

strong.style: color: rgb(51, 51, 51); font-family: Oswald, sans-serif !important; text-align: center;

div.span: We're excited to announce the launch of Scottsboro City Schools mobile app. It is available in the iOS and Android app stores, and as a web app. Just search for Scottsboro City SD or Scottsboro City School District.
Once the app is downloaded, you can go into settings and select the school that you want to view.

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; letter-spacing: normal; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 48px;

span.span: Scottsboro City Schools does not discriminate in admission, treatment, or access to programs or activities based on race, color, national origin, religious preference, disability, age, gender, sexual orientation, citizenship, non-English speaking ability, or homeless status and

span.style: background-image: initial; background-position: initial; background-size: initial; background-repeat: initial; background-attachment: initial; background-origin: initial; background-clip: initial; margin: 0px; color: rgb(3, 10, 19);

span.span: provided equal access to the Boy Scouts and other designated youth groups.

Students with disabilities will be provided with the same needed supports and services for extracurricular programs and activities that are provided during the school day, unless doing so would fundamentally alter the nature of the program and activity.

div.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: georgia, serif; font-size: large;

p.style: color: rgb(34, 34, 34); font-family: Arial, Helvetica, sans-serif; font-size: small; letter-spacing: normal; margin-bottom: 0px; margin-left: 48px;

span.style: margin: 0px; font-size: 10pt; font-family: "Times New Roman"; color: rgb(0, 0, 0);

span.span: The following person has been designated to handle inquiries regarding the non-discrimination policies:
Kristie Shankles, Scottsboro City Board of Education, 305 South Scott Street, Scottsboro, AL 35768. Phone: (256) 218- 2109. Email:
